triples.name: Syntax
triples.relevance: The paper addresses limitations of syntactic structures for semantic applications.

triples.name: Semantics
triples.relevance: UCCA is a framework specifically designed for semantic representation of linguistic utterances.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper describes the compilation of a UCCA-annotated corpus for linguistic research.

triples.name: Text annotation
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates that UCCA can be effectively learned by annotators to create annotated corpora.

triples.name: Semantic role labeling
triples.relevance: Semantic role labeling concepts underpin UCCA's approach to representing semantic distinctions in language.
